subject: Sleep
title: Sleep Apnea Shatters Cycles
description: A fast breakdown of Sleep Apnea Shatters Cycles for builders.

hook.text: A man sleeps nine hours every night and still falls asleep at his desk every afternoon. Something is breaking his sleep.

buildup.text: Sleep apnea causes the airway to collapse during sleep, stopping breathing for 10 to 30 seconds.

discovery.text: The brain detects low oxygen and forces a micro-awakening to reopen the airway. This can happen 30+ times an hour.

twist.text: Each awakening resets the sleep cycle. The person never reaches sustained deep or REM sleep.

climax.text: Nine hours in bed means nothing if cycles are shattered every two minutes. Duration without depth is hollow.

punchline.text: You can sleep nine hours and get zero rest.

quiz.question: How does sleep apnea prevent restful sleep?
options: It keeps people awake all night
Micro-awakenings reset sleep cycles dozens of times
